Package com.project.demo.controller

Class MenuItemController

java.lang.Object
com.project.demo.controller.MenuItemController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/api/v1/menu-item", consumes="application/json", produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public class MenuItemController extends Object
Author:
Kaushik Boora. The API path for MenuItems is /api/v1/menu-item. This represents a Controller class for menuItems. This class provides CRUD operation for the resource "MenuItem". This controller class provides following methods,
API description
HTTP MethodPathDescription
POST/api/v1/menu-item/restaurant/{restaurantId}/food/{foodId} Adds menuItem to DB and links it with Food and Restaurant. Expects the menuItem to be present in the body and restaurant id and Food id provided in the path variable.
GET/api/v1/menu-itemFetches all the menuItems in the Database.
GET/api/v1/menu-item/{menuItemId} Fetches the menuItem whose Id is mentioned in the PathVariable.
PUT/api/v1/menu-item/{menuItemId} Updates the menuItem with new menuItem provided in the body.
DELETE/api/v1/menu-item/{menuItemId} Deletes the menuItem whose id is provided in the path variable.

    • getMenuItem

      @GetMapping("/{menuItemId}") public com.project.demo.model.MenuItem getMenuItem(@PathVariable("menuItemId") long menuItemId)
      Fetches the information of menuItem whose ID is provided.
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - Id of the menuItem whose info needs to be fetched.
      Returns:

    • createMenuItem

      @PostMapping("/restaurant/{restaurantId}/food/{foodId}") public com.project.demo.model.MenuItem createMenuItem(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid com.project.demo.model.MenuItem menuItem, @PathVariable("restaurantId") long restaurantId, @PathVariable("foodId") long foodId)
      Adds MenuItem to the DB and links it with appropriate restaurant and food.
      Parameters:
      menuItem - MenuItem data sent as a part of body.
      restaurantId - Id of the restaurant to which menuItem needs to be associated.
      foodId - Id of the food to which menuItem needs to be associated.
      Returns:
      the menuItem that is created on the database.

      Updates the MenuItem with a new menuItem provided in the body.
      Parameters:

      menuItemId - ID of the menuItem that must be updated.
      Returns:
